attributes.action: Exam support plan for students sitting exams in 2022.
attributes.additional_details: The government support plan could consist of a percentage of the students grade being teacher assessed or it could be narrowing of the course that the students are studying. Students will be at an unfair advantage if they are expected to sit exams as normal next year.
attributes.background: Students in year 10 and year 12 who will be sitting there exams next summer will have missed over 6 months of in school education due to the pandemic. The government should have an exam support plan in place for these students.
